questions.question: How would you optimize your bakery’s website for local SEO in Lagos?
options: A) Use global keywords like 'best bakery'
B) List on Google My Business with your bakery's address and phone number
C) Write content in a foreign language

questions.question: How can a fashion store in Abuja improve search rankings?
options: A) Optimize with keywords like 'affordable fashion in Abuja' and ensure fast loading
B) Focus on paid ads only
C) Avoid using keywords

questions.question: How can a wedding planner improve website user experience?
options: A) Add more content with images and ensure fast loading
B) Add irrelevant content
C) Remove contact details

questions.question: How do backlinks help your website?
options: A) They increase your website’s credibility and improve trust
B) They help you create better ads
C) They lower your website’s ranking

questions.question: How would you ensure your website is mobile-friendly?
options: A) Use a responsive site that adjusts for mobile users
B) Not allow mobile users to view the site
C) Remove all content

questions.question: What is Google My Business?
options: A) A tool that allows your business to show up in Google search and maps
B) A website builder
C) A social media platform

questions.question: How can you use images on your website for SEO?
options: A) Use descriptive filenames and alt-text
B) Ignore images
C) Use unrelated images

questions.question: How can you improve website loading speed?
options: A) Compress images and use PageSpeed tools
B) Add more images without compression
C) Remove all content

questions.question: Why is using keywords in headings important?
options: A) Helps your content rank higher on Google
B) Makes your website colorful
C) Reduces load time

questions.question: What does 'mobile-optimized' website mean?
options: A) It looks and works well on mobile devices
B) Only works on computers
C) Is hard to navigate
